required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study to Evaluate Safety, Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of VM-1500A-LAI Single and Multiple Ascending Doses in Healthy Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: Open-Label Study to Evaluate Safety, Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of VM-1500A-LAI Single and Multiple Ascending Doses in Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: This is a study to evaluate safety, tolerability and pharmacokinetics of VM-1500A-LAI single and multiple ascending doses in healthy subjects. The study will be conducted in 1 investigational site in Russia in healthy volunteers.

detailed_description.textblock: This is a study to evaluate safety, tolerability and pharmacokinetics of a long-acting injectable NNRTI VM-1500A-LAI single and multiple ascending doses in healthy subjects. The study will be conducted in 1 investigational site in Russia in healthy volunteers.

primary_outcome.measure: The incidence of AEs and SAEs
primary_outcome.time_frame: 4 weeks for SAD, 8 weeks for MAD
primary_outcome.description: The incidence of adverse events (AEs) and serious adverse events (SAEs)

arm_group.description: VM-1500A-LAI selected dose IM, 2 injections monthly
VM-1500A-LAI double selected dose IM, 2 injections monthly

intervention.description: VM1500A (parent drug of elsulfavirine) IM injection dosage form

overall_official.affiliation: I.M. Sechenov First Moscow State Medical University

facility.name: I.M. Sechenov First Moscow State Medical University
